dialogXML.title: Concerned citizen is not giving up

paraDialog.line: I am writing to thank you for your concern over some apparent bullying of one of our pupils by another.

I know Mrs Lockley, one of the Governors, has explained that we do not have the formal legal power to punish our pupils for bad behaviour out of school. However, we have followed up your concerns and now have clear evidence that the bullying you observed also takes place in school. We are dealing with this internally and have been in touch with both the girls' families. I am not able to discuss all the details with you, but can assure you that unpleasant scenes such as you witnessed in your shop are unlikely to recur, since we have made arrangements after school to prevent it.
Again, thank you for contacting us. We do appreciate your involvement and please do not hesitate to contact me again.
